title: Newtons first law - puck sliding on frozen pond

content.question: A puck slides freely across the horizontal surface of a frozen pond with negligible friction. Which of the following is true of the motion of the puck?

choices.label: The puck will slide with a constant nonzero acceleration.
The puck will slide with a decreasing acceleration.
The puck will slide with an increasing acceleration.
The puck will slide with a constant velocity.

content.answer: The puck will slide with a constant velocity.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
